entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value:
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from javax.xml.parsers import DocumentBuilderFactory from org.xml.sax import InputSource from java.io import StringReader
class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self): pass
def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) factory = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance() builder = factory.newDocumentBuilder() xmlInput = InputSource(StringReader(text)) doc = builder.parse(xmlInput)
# Extraer el valor del tag <return> return_value = doc.getElementsByTagName("return").item(0).getTextContent()
# Inicializar contador de GUIDItems guid_items_count = 0
if return_value == "no_error": # Extraer y procesar <trans_list_xml> trans_list_xml_elements = doc.getElementsByTagName("trans_list_xml") if trans_list_xml_elements and trans_list_xml_elements.item(0).hasChildNodes(): trans_list_xml = trans_list_xml_elements.item(0).getTextContent() decoded_xml = trans_list_xml.replace('<', '<').replace('>', '>').replace('&', '&') guid_items_input = InputSource(StringReader(decoded_xml)) guid_items_doc = builder.parse(guid_items_input) guid_items = guid_items_doc.getElementsByTagName("GUIDItem") guid_items_count = guid_items.getLength()
if guid_items_count > 0: # Escribir el contenido XML de GUIDItems en el cuerpo del FlowFile outputStream.write(decoded_xml.encode("utf-8")) else: # Si no hay GUIDItems, dejar el contenido original outputStream.write(text.encode("utf-8")) else: # Si trans_list_xml est vaco o no se encuentra outputStream.write(text.encode("utf-8")) else: # Si return_value no es "no_error", dejar el contenido original outputStream.write(text.encode("utf-8"))
# Aadir o actualizar atributos al FlowFile despus de cerrar outputStream global return_value_attr, guid_items_count_attr return_value_attr = return_value guid_items_count_attr = str(guid_items_count)
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile: callback = PyStreamCallback() flowFile = session.write(flowFile, callback) # Asegrate de establecer los atributos despus de procesar el FlowFile flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "return_value", return_value_attr) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "GUID_Items", guid_items_count_attr) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
